name: Ortovox Haute Route 32 Backpack - Unisex
description: With it's large capacity, the Haute Route 32 has space for all you need on longer touring days. It's rigged with ski, board or snowshoe carry systems, and a large front compartment for all your avi gear. The 3D shaped back panel and countoured hip fins keep weight balanced and centre when it's time for some turns.Made of burly 420-denier Cordura® nylon with a polyurethane  coating.Padded and shaped foam shoulder straps, hip fins and O-Flex-2 backpanel distribute the load.Large main compartment is accessed top zipper or back panel.Dedicated compartment holds your avalanche gear.Small top pocket has a zip and key clip.Hipbelt pocket and gear loop keeps essentials close at hand.Lots of external carry options, including rope, crampon and ice axe/trekking pole attachments, and snowboard and snowshoe webbing.
